column4: Hi, I have a friend's machine hooked up to high speed and it is version 7.04 of Ubuntu.  Synaptic shows an option to upgrade to a newer version.  Is this fairly straight-forward or is the process in upgrading from 7.04 to the newest version full of pot holes?
so will aptitude take care of that... I see the ubottu post
please look at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UpgradeNotes - its a multi step process
